about.name: Thushara
about.firstPageInfo: I've been drawing and playing with colours since childhood. Also I still feel like design is everywhere. As a frontend developer I enjoy designing websites and adding colours to everything I create.
about.secondPageInfo: My name is Thushara Weeraparakrama and I'm currently a Frontend development student in ReDI School-Munich. I like to design and create websites and I'm searching for a job in Frontend development. I try to look at everything in an artistic way. Also I implement my learning from the school and external sources in to my creations. When I get free times I read articles about new trends and applications in Frontend development. I always enjoy from everything I create and design and there is always some thing new to learn.
